tool.name: folders

param.name: folder_id
param.label: Folder Id
param.help: the folder's encoded id, prefixed by 'F'

param.name: undelete
param.label: Undelete
param.help: If set to True, the folder will be undeleted (i.e. the `deleted` mark will be removed)

tool.help: Marks the folder with the given ``id`` as `deleted` (or removes the `deleted` mark if the `undelete` param is True).
